def getBit(int n, int i) = (n & (1 << i)) >> i

def setBit(int n, int i) = n ||| (1 << i)

def invert(int n) = (
	int x = 0
	for i in (0..32) (
		if (getBit(n, i) == 0) (
			x = setBit(x, i)
		)
	)
	return x
)

def bitstring(int n) = bitstring(n, 32)

def bitstring (int n, int bits) = (
	string str = ""
	for i in ((bits - 1)..0) (
		str = str ++ show(getBit(n, i))
	)
	return str
)
